# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width = 10)
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(text)
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = ""
        end
        current_line *= " " * word
    end
    push!(lines, current_line)
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

text = "This is a very long sentence that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line."
println(wrap_string(text))
```

输出：
```
This is a very
long sentence that
should be wrapped
at 10 characters
per line.
```
